title: Corporate Safety Office
description: In this week’s episode, we are joined by Linda DeCarlo, the Postal Service's Senior Director of Occupational Safety and Health to talk about how important safety is at such a large and diverse organization. We’ll learn more about employee training and how the Postal Service is focused on building a better workplace for all of its employees. We’ll also talk about the impacts technology has made, things you can do to help with mail carrier safety, and more.
author: mediacenter@usps.gov (United States Postal Service)
